text: View of the Farhad Village-Nishapur Farhad (, as Farhād) is a village in Rivand Rural District, in the Central District of Nishapur County, Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran. At the 1954 census, its population was 132, but now the population is empty. == References == Category:Populated places in Nishapur County
title: Farhad, Nishapur
